title: Pravda/Portal Kombat Venezuela surge signals (reported)
summary: Summit IO scaffold captures reported surge conditions for Pravda/Portal Kombat coverage tied to Venezuela in early January 2026. Timeline latency for the pivot is Deferred pending dashboard timestamp exports.

Reporting indicates high-volume output scale in 2024, suitable for surge-baseline comparisons once feed exports are ingested.
